Malaria Resistance Surveillance (MaRS)

The Malaria Resistance Surveillance (MaRS) project aims to standardize the collection and mapping of genetic polymorphisms associated with drug resistance in malaria around the world.

Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)

MaRS Laboratory Protocolmore_vert

Github

close

Track any changes and/or updates to the targeted amplicon deep sequencing protocol for the full length drug resistance associated genes (k13, mdr1, crt, dhps, dhfr) and mitochondrial genome on the MiSeq System. Click on the github link for the detailed step by step protocol.

Github
MaRS Bioinformatics Pipelinemore_vert

Github

close

Track any changes and/or updates to the bioinormatics analysis pipeline. The analysis pipeline can be installed on any standard laptop. For detailed directions on how to set up the the MaRS analysis pipeline click on the github link!
